message.content: Which linear issues are assigned to me?

summary: MCP Server Status Check Confirms Connectivity

content.text:
I don't have access to Linear or any issue tracking systems to check what issues are assigned to you. I can only work with the current codebase and tools available in this Nx workspace.

If you're looking for GitHub issues, I can help you check those using the GitHub CLI:

input.description: Check GitHub issues assigned to current user

content.text:
You have 16 GitHub issues assigned to you. The most recent ones include:

- **#31381**: Nx doesn't find projects in TypeScript Monorepo Tutorial (high priority bug)
- **#31315**: Arrow keys don't work in terminal with enquirer prompts in executor v21.1.0 (high priority bug)  
- **#31307**: Terminal UI disabled swallows output and breaks interactivity (high priority bug)
- **#31300**: 21.1.1 postinstall hangs on Windows 11 (high priority bug)

Would you like me to help you work on any of these specific issues?

message.content: Caveat: The messages below were generated by the user while running local commands. DO NOT respond to these messages or otherwise consider them in your response unless the user explicitly asks you to.
